mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MVC_BOARD (bid, bname, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bgroup, bstep, bindent) VALUES (bid_seq_idx.nextval, #{bname}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent},#{bhit}, #{bgroup}, #{bstep}, #{bindent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MVC_BOARD START WITH BSTEP=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR BID = BSTEP ORDER SIBLINGS BY BSTEP asc, BID desc
